content.text:
**Is anyone running SSB on an public wifi access point?** I've been thinking about finding an old wireless router and setting up an SSB pub on an access point with no password, but I wanted to see if anyone else is doing it first. Living in an urban area I'd be able to broadcast to a *ton* of people, but I'd rather not reinvent the wheel if someone else has done it before.

cc: #piratebox #disaster-radio ( #disasterradio ) #mesh #mesh-networking
